text: Ferdinand Ries's Violin Sonata in E-flat major Op. 18, was published in 1810 by Simrock with a dedication to a "Mademoiselle Maria Held". As with all of the composers published violin sonatas the work is for piano with violin accompaniment. ==Structure== The sonata is in three movements: # Allegro # Andantino # Allegretto moderato Typical performances should take around 30 minutes. ==References== ;Notes ;Sources * * * ==External links== * Category:Violin sonatas by Ferdinand Ries Category:1810 compositions Category:Compositions in E-flat major Category:Music with dedications
title: Violin Sonata No. 9 (Ries)
